text:
- [Narrator] Many organizations
use VMware vSphere

as the foundation for their
on-premises workloads.
These organizations often store their data
in NetApp ONTAP file systems

and require the same capabilities
when scaling in the cloud.
Others are looking to enhance

their disaster recovery efforts
or accelerate migrations

and choose VMware Cloud on AWS
for their hybrid deployments.

Introducing the VMware
Cloud on AWS Integration
with Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP.
Providing the only jointly engineered
fully-managed external NFS data store
for VMware Cloud on AWS

that lets you attach
high performance storage

built on NetApp's popular
ONTAP file system.

Reduce cost by scaling with
flexible storage capacity

as your applications grow
independent of compute resources

and without purchasing
more infrastructure.

Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP
supports VMware-based workloads
across a broad range of use cases,

including business critical
applications, data analytics,
and virtual desktop infrastructure.
Extend existing on-premises investments
without having to change application code
or change how you manage your data.

Modernize and protect
your applications faster.
FSx for ONTAP combines familiar
NetApp ONTAP enterprise features

such as snapshots, clones,
replication, and deduplication

with the agility and
scalability of the AWS Cloud.

Leverage VMware Cloud on AWS
as the fastest safest path
for all your VMware workloads

and accelerate your business
transformation goals.

Learn more about the VMware
Cloud on AWS Integration
with Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP.
